title: Is it must to listen to the Qur'an being recited in the Masjid? - Sheikh Assimalhakeem
transcript: who'sa says in my local masjid for about 30 minutes before the share comes into the message to do to fear someone will be reciting the quran loudly and people will be listening can i also recite the quran silently or is it a must for me to listen to his recitation no you can read your own quran without any problem in sha allah
